settings.title: Outstanding Protection Capacity
settings.text: Experience outstanding protection capacity with HQC Masonry Protection Cream, as its advanced silicone formula infiltrates up to 12mm into Fletton brick, forming a solid barrier against moisture penetration.

settings.title: Improved Energy Efficiency
settings.text: Enjoy improved energy efficiency with HQC Masonry Protection Cream, as its transparent waterproofing sealant shields exterior walls and helps eliminate difficulties such as heat loss and damp, resulting in significant cost savings on heating.

settings.title: Classic Natural Appearance
settings.text: Achieve a classic natural appearance with HQC Masonry Protection Cream, as it cures to a finish that enhances your wall's aesthetics without altering its natural appearance.

settings.title: Significant Cost Savings on Heating
settings.text: Benefit from significant cost savings on heating costs compared to unprotected homes, as tests show that HQC Protection Cream can save 8-10% on central heating costs.

settings.title: Retains Masonry's Strength
settings.text: Retain your masonry's strength with HQC Masonry Protection Cream, as its high-strength technology safeguards brick, stone, mortar, sandstone, and granite, preserving the integrity of your walls.

settings.title: Ultimate Protection Against the Elements
settings.text: Experience ultimate protection against the elements with HQC Premium High-Strength Wall Water Seal, fortified with cutting-edge cream-based formulation designed to elevate your masonry's longevity and aesthetics.

settings.title: Deep-Penetrating Defence in One Coat
settings.text: Say goodbye to multiple coats with HQC Masonry Protection Cream, as its innovative cream effortlessly permeates deep into your masonry in a single, hassle-free application, providing deep-penetrating defence.

settings.title: Preserves Wall Integrity
settings.text: Preserve the integrity of your walls with HQC Masonry Protection Cream, as its breathable formula ensures natural respiration, preventing moisture buildup while maintaining the thermal properties of your cavity wall insulation.

settings.title: Long-Lasting Protection for 25 Years
settings.text: Enjoy long-lasting protection for 25 years with HQC Masonry Protection Cream, ensuring your walls maintain their pristine, natural appearance even after relentless exposure to the elements.

settings.heading: Penetrating Agent:
settings.text: Our masonry cream features a deeply penetrating agent that ensures the protective formula seeps into every pore and capillary of the masonry surface. This allows for thorough coverage, safeguarding the substrate from the inside out against moisture and environmental elements.

settings.heading: Water-Repellent Matrix:
settings.text: At the core of our masonry cream is a water-repellent matrix designed to repel water effectively, ensuring that rain and moisture bead up and roll off the surface. This matrix forms an invisible barrier that protects the masonry from water absorption, which can lead to frost damage and structural issues.

settings.heading: Protective Binders:
settings.text: The cream is fortified with durable binders that adhere to the masonry surface, creating a resilient protective layer. These binders maintain the integrity of the cream's water-repellent properties, ensuring long-term protection from weathering, pollutants, and biological growths like moss and algae.

settings.heading: INGREDIENTS
settings.text: Introducing the ultimate shield against the elements: HQC Storm Shield. This innovative formula is engineered to provide unparalleled protection for your masonry surfaces. Our product stands as a testament to our commitment to superior quality and environmental responsibility, offering robust weatherproofing while being gentle on the planet.

settings.heading: US Vs. THEM
settings.our_store_label: HQC STROM SHIELD - MASONRY PROTECTION CREAM

settings.title: Enhanced Masonry Protection
settings.text: Offers superior protection for brickwork, mortars, and concrete, shielding them from the elements and prolonging their lifespan.

settings.title: Energy Efficiency Improvement
settings.text: Improves the energy efficiency of exterior walls by reducing heat loss and damp, contributing to a more comfortable indoor environment.

settings.title: Deep Penetration
settings.text: Advanced silicone formula penetrates up to 12mm into surfaces like Fletton brick, creating a solid, moisture-resistant barrier.

settings.title: Natural Aesthetic Preservation
settings.text: Cures to a classic, natural finish, ensuring that the wall's aesthetics are not compromised while providing protection.

settings.title: Heating Cost Savings
settings.text: Demonstrated to save 8-10% on central heating costs, making it an economical option compared to an unprotected home.

settings.title: One Coat Application
settings.text: Designed for a single, hassle-free application, this cream permeates deeply into masonry, eliminating the need for multiple coats.

settings.title: Breathable Formula
settings.text: The breathable formula allows masonry to respire naturally, preventing moisture buildup and maintaining the thermal properties of insulation.

settings.title: Long-Term Durability
settings.text: Offers unparalleled protection for up to 25 years, ensuring that walls maintain their integrity and appearance over time.

settings.heading: HOW STROM SHIELD MASONRY PROTECTION CREAM WORK
PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

settings.heading: PAINT
settings.text: Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray Paint with either a roller, brush or spray

Utilizes only high grade ingredients

settings.heading: Environmental Impact
settings.text: HQC Paint takes a stand for the planet with formulations that encourage less frequent application, reducing environmental strain and promoting sustainable living.

settings.heading: Cutting-Edge Technology
settings.text: Paint integrates only high-grade ingredients and advanced resin technology to offer a finish that is not only long-lasting but also vibrant and full of life.

settings.heading: Cost Efficiency
settings.text: Designed to reduce the need for multiple coats, HQC Paint is a cost-effective option that doesn't compromise on quality, providing substantial savings over time.
The HQC Paint Difference

settings.heading: No more multiple products
settings.text: HQC Paint revolutionises painting with its simplicity. One paint does it all, reducing the need for multiple products and streamlining the decorating process.

settings.heading: Diamond durability
settings.text: With diamond durability and superior coverage, The versatility of HQC Paint allows it to be used on a variety of surfaces, from interior & exterior walls to garden fences, without compromising on performance.

settings.heading: Low Price & High Quality
settings.text: HQC Paint delivers in-house quality without the retail markup, making professional-grade results accessible and affordable for everyone.
HQC Paint's Commitment to Quality

settings.heading: Industry-Leading Ingredients
settings.text: HQC paints are formulated with water-based solutions, making them environmentally friendly and safe for use in any setting. Say goodbye to harmful chemicals and toxins, and embrace a greener, more sustainable approach to decorating.

settings.heading: Scrub and Clean with Ease
settings.text: Experience minimal odour levels with HQC paints, ensuring a pleasant painting experience without the discomfort of strong fumes. Perfect for indoor applications where air quality is a concern.

settings.heading: Trusted by Professionals
settings.text: With water-based formulations, cleanup is a breeze. Simply use soap and water to clean your tools and surfaces, reducing waste and environmental impact.

settings.heading: High Quality Coatings: Your All-in-one Modern Decorating Solution
settings.text: HQC Paint transforms the decorating industry with its all-encompassing solution that epitomises convenience, quality, and environmental responsibility.
